CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 12, 1961, p. 3, reads: "JUNIOR MOTHERS CABARET - The fashionable Junior Mothers Club has gathered this dazzling array of talent for its second annual 'Smart Affairs Revue,' which will be held on Sept. 3, at the Greater Pittsburgh Airport's Horizon Room...Right: Norma Malone, left, a member, and her sister Mildred Ball, flank Norma's son Mike...Contact any Junior Mother for ticket."
TitMainTitle: Four women wearing shorts dance outfits, including Evelyn Anderson, Alma Speed Fox seated on floor, Vivian Kiszie, and June Stokes standing in center, posed in interior with alternating block patterned floor, stereo speaker, and landscape picture, for Junior Mothers cabaret event
